title.name: A Chilling Wind
title.flavour text: All things slow under winter's onslaught - even life itself.

title.name: A Dab of Ink
title.flavour text: The Poet's blood is the Empire's ink.

title.name: A Dusty Memory
title.flavour text: In the oldest halls of my mind, at the end of a rarely used passage, lies my greatest treasure: one moment of happiness and innocence, pure and untouchable.

title.name: A Familiar Call
title.flavour text: The mighty huntress always called for her share, But what we shared was a lifelong bond.

title.name: A Fate Worse Than Death
title.flavour text: "It was as though my very thoughts were breaking... fracturing into tiny motes to be lost on the wind."

title.name: A Modest Request
title.flavour text: Cede all power and wealth to me and serve me in perpetuity. A minor inconvenience I assure you.

title.name: A Mother's Parting Gift
title.flavour text: Nature was her domain, Love was her song, Family was her devotion, Knowledge was her gift.

title.name: A Note in the Wind
title.flavour text: The artist is long dead, the lyrics are long forgotten, yet the Song of War longs to be sung again

title.name: A Sea of Blue
title.flavour text: The harvest ended, the floods began.

title.name: A Stone Perfected
title.flavour text: They gave the stone life. Over eons spent bathed in Corruption, that life evolved.

title.name: Abandoned Wealth
title.flavour text: When the world burned, the greedy burned with it, while the clever left as paupers.

title.name: Acclimatisation
title.flavour text: The world is ever-changing. Once-lush woods now lost beneath shifting sands, Great cities now drown beneath turbulent waters. Adapt or perish.

title.name: Akil's Prophecy
title.flavour text: The hatungo know many answers to the same question, for time itself is a tangled web.

title.name: Alivia's Grace
title.flavour text: Her innocence and grace were enough to tame even the wildest of beasts.

title.name: Alluring Bounty
title.flavour text: A treasure worth killing for is a treasure worth dying for.

title.name: Alone in the Darkness
title.flavour text: "Sometimes, the most beautiful treasures...are the ones you cannot have." - Beryl, Survivor from the Azurite Mines

title.name: Altered Perception
title.flavour text: You mustn't forget: you won't be leaving this place.

title.name: Ambitious Obsession
title.flavour text: The most pathetic person in the world is someone who has sight, but no vision.

title.name: Anarchy's Price
title.flavour text: Born of relentless fury and abhorrence, warped by turmoil and anguish, tainted through desire and carnality, I thirst for bloodshed once more.

title.name: Arrogance of the Vaal
title.flavour text: Discovery can lead to beauty, or it can lead to ruin.

title.name: Assassin's Favour
title.flavour text: By the time their eyes meet, the dark deal has long since been made, and his fate long since sealed.

title.name: Astral Protection
title.flavour text: For a time, we had something stronger than eldritch evil. We had each other.

title.name: Atziri's Arsenal
title.flavour text: In the prison of all sins, will you grasp godhood or sorrow? Only hope lies under the shadows.

title.name: Audacity
title.flavour text: A jolt, and it moves. Or smolders. A current, and it lives. Or dies. A surge, and it transcends. Or... not. Only one way to find out.

title.name: Auspicious Ambitions
title.flavour text: "Gaze upon the mirrors of what may come and step backward into infinity." - Dexion, Thaumetic Aspirant

title.name: Azure Rage
title.flavour text: The mask hides his identity but also makes it hard to read...

title.name: Azyran's Reward
title.flavour text: Method transcends shape and size. Do something in parallel long enough, and you will always find another way.

title.name: Baited Expectations
title.flavour text: The line between having not enough to do and too much to do is unusually fine.

title.name: Beauty Through Death
title.flavour text: Her beauty did not fade her humanity did not survive.

title.name: Bijoux
title.flavour text: "Such fine trinkets show their true value in times of crisis." - Tangmazu

title.name: Birth of the Three
title.flavour text: A small token of Her affliction.

title.name: Blessing of God
title.flavour text: When the darkness weighs upon you, grow light from within.

title.name: Blind Venture
title.flavour text: "It's risky not knowing where your wares come from. That's why I source my own." - Klayver, the Antiquarian

title.name: Booba
title.flavour text: The power of the world, lies upon your hands.

title.name: Boon of Justice
title.flavour text: Some gifts are obligations while others are simply opportunities.

title.name: Boon of the First Ones
title.flavour text: Wreathed in the skin and bones of the beasts she slew, her gift came from what she lost: her humanity.

title.name: Boundless Realms
title.flavour text: Boundless is the distance between where we start and where we start again.

title.name: Bowyer's Dream
title.flavour text: If this is my dream, I don't wish to wake.

title.name: Broken Promises
title.flavour text: Experience teaches us that the cold is not the same as the absence of warmth.

title.name: Broken Truce
title.flavour text: With a single act, years of peace have been shattered. An unknown assassin brings war upon us all.

title.name: Brother's Gift
title.flavour text: Even though his flame has burned out, he will never fade away.

title.name: Brother's Stash
title.flavour text: Even though he found the stash just in time, He would trade it all away and then some to have him back.

title.name: Brotherhood in Exile
title.flavour text: Seeking shelter from the night, in the warmth of the run-down inn, erstwhile foes put aside the fight, to bond over whiskey and gin.

title.name: Brush, Paint and Palette
title.flavour text: "Man may shape the world, but these? These shape the man." -Inquisitor Maligaro

title.name: Buried Treasure
title.flavour text: You can't seek riches without getting your hands dirty.

title.name: Burning Blood
title.flavour text: There's a place where up is down, where right is wrong, where pleasure is agony, and where the living wish only for death.

title.name: Call to the First Ones
title.flavour text: The Ezomyte, desperate for aid, cried out to the gods.

title.name: Cameria's Cut
title.flavour text: "There are two ways to pay, Gold and Blood. I'll take my share in both." -Cameria the Coldblooded

title.name: Cartographer's Delight
title.flavour text: A map is similar to a pair of eyes, without one you stumble around, unable to find your way.

title.name: Chaotic Disposition
title.flavour text: Life isn't what you make of it, it's already been made for you.

title.name: Chasing Risk
title.flavour text: A fond memory fills me with nostalgia; some men would have felt guilt, but I felt no regret over the anguish and fear my ambitions caused.

title.name: Checkmate
title.flavour text: When victory is impossible, each of us plays only to delay the end.

title.name: Choking Guilt
title.flavour text: As death approached, clarity eluded him. The pain he had wrought surrounded him, dragging him into darkness.

title.name: Costly Curio
title.flavour text: "Oh no, I couldn't possibly afford this fine artefact. I'm... just looking."

title.name: Council of Cats
title.flavour text: A King Loved By All, A Shadow Awaiting Nightfall, A Speaker Howling Away, A Hunter Seeking Prey

title.name: Coveted Possession
title.flavour text: A taste of power brings a hunger for more.

title.name: Cursed Words
title.flavour text: If you look hard enough for hidden meaning, you will find it.

title.name: Dark Dreams
title.flavour text: No one ever truly understood what she meant when she said she wanted to raise a family.

title.name: Dark Temptation
title.flavour text: "Only a fool looks to the occult for power and expects to be spared from its wrath." - Voll, Emperor of Purity

title.name: Dark Temptation
title.flavour text: "Only a fool looks to the occult for power and expects to be spared from its wrath." - Voll, Emperor of Purity

title.name: Darker Half
title.flavour text: When you find what you're looking for, it's never quite right. When you have what you desire, yet you still want more.

title.name: Deadly Joy
title.flavour text: "Be fast. That is all that matters." - Rita of the Asylum

title.name: Death
title.flavour text: The end of the old, the beginning of the new. A unique opportunity for transformation, for those with the power to grasp it.

title.name: Deathly Designs
title.flavour text: "The Karui was correct; there is virtue in honouring my ancestors."

title.name: Dementophobia
title.flavour text: I never truly understood the depths of my insanity, until I realized the voices beckoning me towards the abyss, were none other than my own.

title.name: Demigod's Wager
title.flavour text: Sometimes you need to make your own luck.

title.name: Desecrated Virtue
title.flavour text: Awoken virtuous slivers of the void, defiled by the avaricious, seized by the tyrannical.

title.name: Desperate Crusade
title.flavour text: Through despondent hardships, those strong of spirit shall claim the prize.

title.name: Destined to Crumble
title.flavour text: "Let us not forget the most important lesson the Vaal taught us: Nothing is eternal." - Siosa Foaga, Imperial Scholar

title.name: Dialla's Subjugation
title.flavour text: A symbol of beauty and innocence The gems corrupted her mind Malachai corrupted her gems All but a glimmer of greatness lost in madness

title.name: Disdain
title.flavour text: No man sees all, but you'll see more than some see in a lifetime.

title.name: Divine Beauty
title.flavour text: In a land far away lived a maiden most fair. Her smile melted the coldest of hearts, her song made men and beast cry, her beauty unparalleled; Divine.

title.name: Divine Justice
title.flavour text: Many sought the Goddess' blessing. Few survived the Labyrinth to receive it.

title.name: Doedre's Madness
title.flavour text: "Hold your tongue before I claim it." - Doedre Darktongue

title.name: Doryani's Epiphany
title.flavour text: "Virtue gems have facets beyond those that can be seen by the mortal eye. Let us look deeper..."

title.name: Draped in Dreams
title.flavour text: The suit I wear, Is heavy and bare. A canvas, it seems, breathing life into dreams.

title.name: Duality
title.flavour text: Good and Evil can be woven together to become something greater than either.

title.name: Dying Anguish
title.flavour text: Moribund, he gazed upon the journey taken as blood trickled down his chin. His eye closed on the city ahead that he would never call home.

title.name: Dying Light
title.flavour text: Even the brightest eventually fade to darkness.

title.name: Earth Drinker
title.flavour text: Taste and grow strong. Drink too much and be buried.

title.name: Echoes of Love
title.flavour text: "I gave up my body for you. I gave up my name for you. And one day I shall give up my life for you."

title.name: Emperor of Purity
title.flavour text: True to his title, Voll, newly crowned, had many of the Eternal Empire's signature extravagances destroyed.

title.name: Emperor's Luck
title.flavour text: The house always wins.

title.name: Endless Night
title.flavour text: The sun shines not for me. I walk in darkness, never free. Time stopped when you both died in my arms.

title.name: Etched in Blood
title.flavour text: When you strive to write your name on the dense pages of History, someone else, inevitably, must be crossed out.

title.name: Eternal Bonds
title.flavour text: Separate, stories untold. Together, memories unfold.

title.name: Ever-Changing
title.flavour text: The Atlas is our prison, and our only defence. She is our only hope, and our certain doom.

title.name: Fateful Meeting
title.flavour text: Some people act as beacons, illuminating the path for others. I was lucky to meet one such person. - Anton to Zhenya

title.name: Fire Of Unknown Origin
title.flavour text: Faith sparks the flame, a frenzy on the wind; a fervour that drives us wildly onward.

title.name: Forbidden Power
title.flavour text: Some things should not be used. Some power is too great a risk.

title.name: Friendship
title.flavour text: "Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames" -Rumi of the Vaal

title.name: From Bone to Ashes
title.flavour text: For centuries, they stood vigil in secret over their sleeping goddess, even as contamination oozed out of the decadent Vaal empire.

title.name: Further Invention
title.flavour text: Why not both?

title.name: Gemcutter's Mercy
title.flavour text: When you can only have one, which shall it be? Red? Blue? Probably Green.

title.name: Gemcutter's Promise
title.flavour text: "I swore to use my position to help the people. What good is power when it just accumulates on the already-powerful?" - Erasmus, Imperial Gemcutter

title.name: Gift of Asenath
title.flavour text: The Golden Sekhema's words could solve many a feud. Just what form that solution took was another matter.

title.name: Gift of the Gemling Queen
title.flavour text: Our Lady Dialla, as a symbol of our progress, shines greater than all the gems.

title.name: Glimmer of Hope
title.flavour text: When you dwell in total darkness, even the faintest light may guide you out.

title.name: Grave Knowledge
title.flavour text: The dead tell me great insights. They've had nothing but time to sit and think.

title.name: Guardian's Challenge
title.flavour text: To accept a challenge from the void is merely suicide for the unprepared.

title.name: Harmony of Souls
title.flavour text: Shrieking souls locked away Hate splits frozen cells asunder The knot of corruption undone at last

title.name: Haunting Shadows
title.flavour text: In the dead of night you may elude your shadows, but they will always find you by dawn.

title.name: Her Mask
title.flavour text: To her beauty you submit, lest your neck the great Queen slit.

title.name: Heterochromia
title.flavour text: Black and White, Silver and Gold Let us see the world Unfold Red and Blue, Yellow and Green Let us remake it in colours Unseen

title.name: His Judgement
title.flavour text: Disabled

title.name: Home
title.flavour text: There are countless people, countless stories, and countless eras, but there is one place that, for a time, each of us loved and was loved. It matters. We matter.

title.name: Hope
title.flavour text: The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.

title.name: House of Mirrors
title.flavour text: What do you see in the mirror?

title.name: Hubris
title.flavour text: "This one? It is NOT for sale. You would sooner pry it from my lifeless hand." - Jonfé Darontos, Ringmaker

title.name: Hunter's Resolve
title.flavour text: Primed, curved and sleek. Decisive and final. For malice and righteousness. There's but one solution.

title.name: Hunter's Reward
title.flavour text: To tame a beast, you first must subdue its heart.

title.name: Immortal Resolve
title.flavour text: The threads of fate are the strongest ties.

title.name: Imperfect Memories
title.flavour text: Everything is eroded by time, but sometimes the edges that fade can make a wonderful memory even more beautiful.

title.name: Imperial Legacy
title.flavour text: A life lost, A legacy born.

title.name: Jack in the Box
title.flavour text: Turn the crank, close your eyes, and pray to the gods for a pleasant surprise.

title.name: Judging Voices
title.flavour text: He was seeking sanity, but the demons were inside his head.

title.name: Justified Ambition
title.flavour text: "Everything I have done has been for Wraeclast. You would pledge your life to me if you saw things my way... and soon, you will." - High Templar Venarius

title.name: Keeper's Corruption
title.flavour text: With great power comes... ...Even greater power.

title.name: Lachrymal Necrosis
title.flavour text: Without the ability to weep, the heart hardens against both the pure and the corrupt.

title.name: Lantador's Lost Love
title.flavour text: They fought the storm together as one, Until the longest of days was done. Their love grew stronger with every breath, Until it was broken apart in death.

title.name: Last Hope
title.flavour text: As their civilisation crumbled, the Vaal looked to their queen. In her, they saw a way out. In them, she saw a burden she was happy to free herself from.

title.name: Left to Fate
title.flavour text: Many strive for greatness, but it is challenge, unforeseen, that forges heroes.

title.name: Lethean Temptation
title.flavour text: My memories tortured me without end. To escape them, I embraced nothingness, but oblivion simply brought a different kind of pain...

title.name: Light and Truth
title.flavour text: Time and change shall naught avail, To dim the Light of Truth's fair grail.

title.name: Lingering Remnants
title.flavour text: Never dying, yet not living, Endlessly they wander beneath the harvest moon.

title.name: Lost Worlds
title.flavour text: "There are worlds that lie beyond the edge of my page, the edge of my understanding. Worlds of wonder. Worlds of terror." Aramil - Cartographer to Emperor Chitus

title.name: Love Through Ice
title.flavour text: "I know one lady for whose sake I will rip out my heart" - Derrok, the Dreamer

title.name: Loyalty
title.flavour text: Bound by fate, inseparable by choice.

title.name: Luck of the Vaal
title.flavour text: They can't be THAT lucky, or they'd still be here!

title.name: Lucky Connections
title.flavour text: Luck is a fool's game, and I know plenty of rich fools.

title.name: Lucky Deck
title.flavour text: When the outcome is the same, does it matter if it is fortune or trickery?

title.name: Luminous Trove
title.flavour text: Plenty enter, dreaming of treasure Twenty bled, slain as they fled Shadows loom, half left doomed The blind cries, five lost eyes Careless twins, a lich's new prize One as a decoy, none pass the king Gehennix feeds only on whispers

title.name: Lysah's Respite
title.flavour text: So many memories, so much pain in such a small token. Drown it in blood so you can forget.

title.name: Magnum Opus
title.flavour text: Wraeclast will unite. This shall be my great work - the minds of the people made one.

title.name: Man With Bear
title.flavour text: A stereotypical joke may lead to an unexpected bond.

title.name: Matryoshka
title.flavour text: I cannot contain myself, but I can barely squeak, so many words I'd have for you, if I could only speak!

title.name: Mawr Blaidd
title.flavour text: Rigwald believed he'd seized great power, but it was the great power that had seized Rigwald

title.name: Merciless Armament
title.flavour text: "Through thick and thin, blood and bone, a peaceful life is one I can't condone." - Tukohama, Father Of War

title.name: Might is Right
title.flavour text: The mind had much to endure before the advent of thaumaturgy.

title.name: Misery in Darkness
title.flavour text: He wandered the bone-filled depths hoping each corner would be his last. Eventually, he found Light.

title.name: Mitts
title.flavour text: Those whose hands are their livelihood know the importance of keeping them safe and warm.

title.name: Monochrome
title.flavour text: "You cannot portray the world using just one colour. Together, you and I, we will paint our world into perfection." - Kyra, renegade thaumaturgist

title.name: More is Never Enough
title.flavour text: Greed is a hunger that only grows as you feed it

title.name: No Traces
title.flavour text: There is no mistake so great that it cannot be undone.

title.name: Nook's Crown
title.flavour text: Every skull was once a person. Though 'Who?' is rarely asked. Friends, who wear the crown of Nook, Never need to ask. They remember.

title.name: Parasitic Passengers
title.flavour text: Feeding on death, they grew stronger and stronger, until they were ready to hatch...

title.name: Peaceful Moments
title.flavour text: Savour these moments, for they may never return.

title.name: Perfection
title.flavour text: There are countless worlds, but only those with limitless potential will be able to achieve perfection.

title.name: Poisoned Faith
title.flavour text: Even our most devout beliefs are subtly shaped by our darkest desires.

title.name: Prejudice
title.flavour text: One who is blinded by their past may only see a sliver of the present.

title.name: Pride Before the Fall
title.flavour text: As Kaom slew the last of his kin, something deep inside him broke. And through the cracks, corruption, pure and black, spread forth.

title.name: Pride of the First Ones
title.flavour text: Upon silent paws and masked by the reeds, Farrul's hunt begins as the light recedes.

title.name: Prometheus' Armoury
title.flavour text: It is a mortal man's folly to seek power beyond his comprehension.

title.name: Prosperity
title.flavour text: Accumulating wealth has its own costs.

title.name: Rain of Chaos
title.flavour text: Fire filled the sky that night Chaos reigned Where the shards fell All was destroyed -Jozen Kasigi, retelling an urban legend of the Cataclysm

title.name: Rain Tempter
title.flavour text: Be like water, friend.

title.name: Rats
title.flavour text: Whoever said 'more is always better' has obviously never met a rat.

title.name: Rebirth
title.flavour text: He shattered Her smile Scattered the fragments like ash All she did was laugh

title.name: Rebirth and Renewal
title.flavour text: Life has an end, then life begins again.

title.name: Reckless Ambition
title.flavour text: Why settle when more is never enough.

title.name: Remembrance
title.flavour text: "For all your struggles, all your achievements, even for the greatest of us, a story is all that remains. Write it well."  -Julius Perandus, Father of Chitus

title.name: Sambodhi's Vow
title.flavour text: He dispels dark realms until mortal sufferings yield to hopeful light.

title.name: Sambodhi's Wisdom
title.flavour text: No blade conquers sin; guide a sinner to virtue, unveil their lost sight— your eyes, too, see in everyone the inner child, no matter their might.

title.name: Scholar of the Seas
title.flavour text: I've never come upon a ship I could not command. I have however met sailors that were not willing to be led.

title.name: Seven Years Bad Luck
title.flavour text: If enough people believe something to be true, whether or not it is becomes irrelevant.

title.name: Shard of Fate
title.flavour text: Their whims left unknown, Their life left for others.

title.name: Silence and Frost
title.flavour text: Cry havoc! Unleash pandemonium!

title.name: Society's Remorse
title.flavour text: We live to dream of worlds we aren't in, a false narrative that we use to fill our souls with doubt; The world is already beautiful, there's no need to dream.

title.name: Something Dark
title.flavour text: Even in darkness you may find a friend.

title.name: Soul Quenched
title.flavour text: Weapons such as these require a darker kind of forge...

title.name: Squandered Prosperity
title.flavour text: "Our rulers are being ridiculous, and we are suffering."

title.name: Struck by Lightning
title.flavour text: 'Lightning never strikes the same place twice' is really just wishful thinking.

title.name: Succor of the Sinless
title.flavour text: Blessed is the blood of the beholden disciple. The earth is anointed by his step. The damnable are sanctified by his strike.

title.name: Terrible Secret of Space
title.flavour text: They said they were here to protect us.

title.name: The Academic
title.flavour text: "Such dedication for so many years, all for a couple extra letters at the front of your name..."

title.name: The Admirer
title.flavour text: Lucian lost himself in ancient scrolls and found in those scrolls a love whose power bridged a millennium.

title.name: The Adventuring Spirit
title.flavour text: Dost thou lead my men to victory, my child?

title.name: The Aesthete
title.flavour text: "Some see our mortal flesh as a limitation. I see it as an opportunity for vast, miraculous improvements." - Shavronne of Umbra

title.name: The Apothecary
title.flavour text: "You seek the power of my strongest potions, but the price will be far higher than you can imagine."

title.name: The Archmage's Right Hand
title.flavour text: "When grasped in his hand, even an ordinary piece of wood can make the heavens tremble with fear."

title.name: The Arena Champion
title.flavour text: The fight is the easy part. It's the years of training that'll kill you.

title.name: The Army of Blood
title.flavour text: I gave my mind without a fight, The twelfth hour I lost control. The day is gone but there is light, eyes that glow like red-hot coal.

title.name: The Artist
title.flavour text: "Paint, metal, flesh... A true artist does not limit himself." - Malachai the Soulless

title.name: The Aspirant
title.flavour text: Those Exiles that survive Wraeclast dream not of home, but of power.

title.name: The Astromancer
title.flavour text: They would say that he was a dangerous man, unbound by the sense of morality, but what does this matter, when his love for humanity is undeniable and completion of his work would benefit everyone?

title.name: The Avenger
title.flavour text: Justice comes swift Equal to the crime Revenge is a gift Life for a life Eye for an eye

title.name: The Awakened
title.flavour text: Some seek to change the world. Others change the world as a consequence of what they seek.

title.name: The Bargain
title.flavour text: In the pursuit of power, as in that of wealth, anything goes.

title.name: The Battle Born
title.flavour text: "No man can best me, no demon can fell me. For I vanquish all with my axe!"

title.name: The Bear Woman
title.flavour text: For the blessed bear in the cave, A hundred days pass in silence and darkness, until moon begins its fourth passage, the bear sheds her beastly fur, and is reborn, human and whole.

title.name: The Beast
title.flavour text: To know the monster, you must become the monster.

title.name: The Betrayal
title.flavour text: It's sad times we live in when a friendship has a price people are willing to pay.

title.name: The Bitter Blossom
title.flavour text: The pain you feel is of no consequence, it is evolution, to be made whole within something greater.

title.name: The Blazing Fire
title.flavour text: Lethal, untouchable, keen, aflame. Just what I was looking for.

title.name: The Blessing of Moosh
title.flavour text: While the Labyrinth traps have claimed countless adventurers, they were not designed with felines in mind.

title.name: The Body
title.flavour text: They say it is the head that leads, but all must flow through the body at some point.

title.name: The Bones
title.flavour text: The flesh is a prison, and we are finally free.

title.name: The Brawny Battle Mage
title.flavour text: A humble piece of wood offers the simplest solution to life's problems: just hit them really, really hard.

title.name: The Breach
title.flavour text: Ever get the feeling you're being watched...?

title.name: The Brittle Emperor
title.flavour text: "When Voll spared Malachai, accepting his aid in pursuit of Purity, the strongest faith was infected by Corruption and made brittle as glass." - Victario, the People's Poet

title.name: The Cache
title.flavour text: Vintage or crafted, Glittering and shiny Dusty or glittering, huge or tiny Secured within a chest or unearthed from your mining Find jewellery everywhere, no need for divining! So why is it so hard to figure out which one to wear? This one makes me stronger, but does it match my hair?

title.name: The Cacophony
title.flavour text: Nothing can be heard above the din or seen amongst the turmoil. The senses are shattered. All is left to fate.

title.name: The Calling
title.flavour text: Blood flows not just through veins, but through worlds.

title.name: The Card Sharp
title.flavour text: "The house always wins... except when I do."

title.name: The Carrion Crow
title.flavour text: From death, life. From life, death. The wheel turns, and the corbies wheel overhead.

title.name: The Cartographer
title.flavour text: My son, you lost your way before you arrived. To never lose you again, I make a path in my heart.

title.name: The Cataclysm
title.flavour text: The mighty warriors traded in blows, the nimble archers in arrows, yet it was the brazen thaumaturgists who would bring catastrophe to all.

title.name: The Catalyst
title.flavour text: Simple actions can lead the world to an early grave.

title.name: The Catch
title.flavour text: The largest hooks offer the greatest catch, but often the catch is the hook.

title.name: The Celestial Justicar
title.flavour text: Wrapped in the glory of the heavens, she comes to mete out justice for the fallen.

title.name: The Celestial Stone
title.flavour text: Stare into its depths too long, and you may lose yourself entirely.

title.name: The Chains that Bind
title.flavour text: Scarier than any criminal is an innocent man in chains, for when he breaks free, his revenge will be justified.

title.name: The Cheater
title.flavour text: Sometimes the best way to achieve greatness is to use a shortcut.

title.name: The Chosen
title.flavour text: They whose lives were given to clothe the Dark Dreamer... They were the lucky ones.

title.name: The Coming Storm
title.flavour text: No man may hope to turn back the storm. You can only hope you do not attract its ire.

title.name: The Conduit
title.flavour text: The path to godhood is guided by the hand of sacrifice.

title.name: The Craving
title.flavour text: What was once a passing thought tickling the back of the mind is now a desperate, driving desire.

title.name: The Cursed King
title.flavour text: The First Ones may be blasphemy, but they are powerful blasphemy.

title.name: The Damned
title.flavour text: Souls along a conduit of blood, from one vessel to the next.

title.name: The Dapper Prodigy
title.flavour text: "Many believe murder is a grisly, grim, and grotesque crime. Then there are those who simply make art of it."

title.name: The Dark Mage
title.flavour text: With staff in hand and wrath in heart, your soul and corpse shall surely part.

title.name: The Darkest Dream
title.flavour text: A dream from which you cannot awake is nothing other than a nightmare.

title.name: The Deal
title.flavour text: In the pursuit of wealth, as in that of power, anything goes.

title.name: The Deceiver
title.flavour text: Beware the combatant who shows no confidence, yet still enters the ring, for they are surely hiding something.

title.name: The Deep Ones
title.flavour text: "The Seas Call, the Mad Answer"

title.name: The Demon
title.flavour text: A man who hears voices may not necessarily be crazy.

title.name: The Demoness
title.flavour text: Wherever she went, death was sure to follow.

title.name: The Destination
title.flavour text: You may be nothing to everybody, but you are everything to somebody.

title.name: The Devastator
title.flavour text: Only a fool tries to contain unlimited power.

title.name: The Doctor
title.flavour text: "They said I needed my head examined, but I'd rather just take yours." - Klopek the Cannibal

title.name: The Doppelganger
title.flavour text: Upon seeing her face, I am terrified—the moon shows me my own form!

title.name: The Dragon
title.flavour text: Scaly beast of the skies, watching with his golden eyes. Shadow that blocks out the sun, it's too late for you to run.

title.name: The Dragon's Heart
title.flavour text: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

title.name: The Dreamer
title.flavour text: A dark note drips from the dreamer's lips, A honeyed melody. We stand, we fall on his beck and call, for in his dream we're free.

title.name: The Dreamland
title.flavour text: All dreams vanish when the dreamers wake.

title.name: The Drunken Aristocrat
title.flavour text: The finer the brew, the harder it is to remember drinking it.

title.name: The Dungeon Master
title.flavour text: "So desperate was I for control, I turned my entire world into a prison. Now you will share in my agony."

title.name: The Easy Stroll
title.flavour text: "I'm going for a walk. I'll be back soon."  - Blonca's last words

title.name: The Eldritch Decay
title.flavour text: Time dismantles all things eventually, but some wish to accelerate the process.

title.name: The Emptiness
title.flavour text: He appeared before the Light Eater, and at once knew his soul was damned.

title.name: The Encroaching Darkness
title.flavour text: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

title.name: The Endless Darkness
title.flavour text: Gaze towards the stars, but beware what gazes back.

title.name: The Endurance
title.flavour text: Crimson rubies, drops of vigour, flowing through my veins, flesh like coal, try to crush me, diamond is what remains.

title.name: The Enforcer
title.flavour text: "Boss said to get rid of him, didn't say not to make a mess." - Rune The Goon

title.name: The Enlightened
title.flavour text: Weaving the six, a serpent stands tall. Wearing a crown, the thousand petals call.

title.name: The Enthusiasts
title.flavour text: "Glimmers of benevolence, Shrouded a lacquered lust for power, Yet still they followed his influence."

title.name: The Escape
title.flavour text: In fleeing reality, you step into the realm of madness.

title.name: The Eternal War
title.flavour text: They believed, falsely, that the strongest of generals could outlast eons of corruption.

title.name: The Ethereal
title.flavour text: "Long ago, people looked to the stars, believing they influenced us. Soon, it will be us who influence the stars." - Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturge

title.name: The Explorer
title.flavour text: A map is only useful if you know where you stand.

title.name: The Eye of Terror
title.flavour text: The Lord of Chaos dreams as his Eye gazes, unblinking, at his prize. And soon, all shall tremble before his waking form.

title.name: The Eye of the Dragon
title.flavour text: Some powers are far too great even for the gods of old.

title.name: The Fathomless Depths
title.flavour text: Fall into endless night; a voyage into an ocean of oblivion.

title.name: The Feast
title.flavour text: Shame what happened to my husband. He had such good taste.

title.name: The Fiend
title.flavour text: Your era is now, your power unwavered, soon we will see who the gods truly favoured.

title.name: The Finishing Touch
title.flavour text: A little extra flair never hurts.

title.name: The Fishmonger
title.flavour text: However vicious Rhoas might be, a dedicated angler may in time tame them.

title.name: The Fletcher
title.flavour text: Let these fine arrows pack a punch.

title.name: The Flora's Gift
title.flavour text: Sturdy and strong, grown from the stream. The Flora that live here, A combatant's dream.

title.name: The Fool
title.flavour text: Even the most learned man is a fool to his own fate.

title.name: The Forgotten Treasure
title.flavour text: Don't let fool's gold deceive you.

title.name: The Formless Sea
title.flavour text: Formless might, Wild beauty tamed, The brine of gods, The seas restrained.

title.name: The Forsaken
title.flavour text: You gave us life and love, more than you could spare. Now you're gone, and we are stranded, alone, cold and without purpose.

title.name: The Fortunate
title.flavour text: The fortunate find generosity in the divine.

title.name: The Forward Gaze
title.flavour text: "When they realize our true intent, they will decry us, assault us, and try to crush what we have built. We must stand tall, Qotra, and make the future our own."

title.name: The Fox
title.flavour text: "Masters of wit, strength and cunning. To survive the harsh winters, you must be like the fox." - Ezomyte Proverb

title.name: The Fox in the Brambles
title.flavour text: Hemmingsworth 6:10 - "And the fox gazed out from the brambles, unreachable and smirking."

title.name: The Gambler
title.flavour text: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

title.name: The Garish Power
title.flavour text: Maligaro may have valued function over form, but that did not mute his flair for the dramatic.

title.name: The Gemcutter
title.flavour text: In the hands of a master craftsman, a worthless pebble can adorn the crown of a king.

title.name: The Gentleman
title.flavour text: "Axes and mauls are so uncivilised. A good clean cut to the neck with a sharp blade, that's the Sarn way!"

title.name: The Gladiator
title.flavour text: The thumb turns down and the crowd roars, they want death and the blood is yours.

title.name: The Golden Era
title.flavour text: Before gemlings, before thaumaturgy, a simple court magician could enthrall the masses.

title.name: The Greatest Intentions
title.flavour text: Chasing purity in the rising light means facing the darkening edges of the spirit.

title.name: The Gulf
title.flavour text: I thought love stronger than all, but time and isolation broke that which madness could not.

title.name: The Hale Heart
title.flavour text: Though the years weakened his mind, his body remained deadly as ever.

title.name: The Harvester
title.flavour text: Taste not of their forbidden fruit. Theirs is a harvest of the darkest kind, twisted, rotten and damned for eternity.

title.name: The Hermit
title.flavour text: The hermit's only friend is the greenery he can find.

title.name: The Heroic Shot
title.flavour text: Try a thousand times, and eventually you'll have to give up.

title.name: The Hive of Knowledge
title.flavour text: Within years of knowledge, distilled by careful craftsmanship, lies great power.

title.name: The Hoarder
title.flavour text: "More! I want more!" - Faendris, the Insatiable

title.name: The Hook
title.flavour text: Every obsession began with a single, innocent taste.

title.name: The Hunger
title.flavour text: "How many lives have you consumed?" "How many times have you blinked?"

title.name: The Immortal
title.flavour text: "Greetings! Just because you think I'm greedy doesn't mean I'm not willing to share. You'll just have to kill me first." -Grandmaster Dy'Ness

title.name: The Incantation
title.flavour text: When there is no other choice, even the meekest whisper can bring about the greatest storm.

title.name: The Innocent
title.flavour text: His brother would not atone, so he took his brother's life, and with it, his sins.

title.name: The Inoculated
title.flavour text: Chaos spread, wreaking havoc and death. They said none would be spared, and yet here I stand.

title.name: The Insane Cat
title.flavour text: One person's madness is another person's reality.

title.name: The Insatiable
title.flavour text: A lust for souls. The urge to kill just to satisfy its thirst. An unbearable burden that would make even the purest heart blacken over time.

title.name: The Inventor
title.flavour text: Jump right in, But beware Of things broken Or beyond compare.

title.name: The Jester
title.flavour text: Summoned for the King's desire, soon applause came from the court. However insanity was his only sire, so the King's reign was cut short.

title.name: The Jeweller's Boon
title.flavour text: The jeweller's true talent is the capacity to see a jewel's beauty before they draw it out.

title.name: The Journalist
title.flavour text: A good spy doesn't forget she's gone undercover.

title.name: The Journey
title.flavour text: Oh the places you will go, the sights you will see, the things you will meet.

title.name: The King's Blade
title.flavour text: "To know for what you fight. To get up again when you've been struck down. To outmanoeuvre someone faster, trick someone smarter, crush someone stronger. That's what it takes to claim the crown." - Daresso, the King of Swords

title.name: The King's Heart
title.flavour text: 500 times Kaom's axe fell, 500 times Kaom's Heart splintered. Finally, all that remained was a terrible, heartless Fury.

title.name: The Landing
title.flavour text: Warriors of a distant land, you embark on a journey from which you may not return, but which we will be all the better for.

title.name: The Last One Standing
title.flavour text: The strongest emerge from suffering. The toughest bear the most scars. The sole survivor claims the greatest of rewards.

title.name: The Last Supper
title.flavour text: "Bino's brief career as a chef at Axiom saved the executioner a lot of work."

title.name: The Leviathan
title.flavour text: Ancient behemoths swam the depths of the oceans long before Man walked these lands.

title.name: The Lich
title.flavour text: When the dead raise and master their own, the land is truly lost.

title.name: The Life Thief
title.flavour text: "The process of eternal youth is a give and take. You give them death and take their youth." - Zerphi of the Vaal

title.name: The Lion
title.flavour text: The Eternals lauded his valour. The Karui relished his defeat. Yet the final thoughts of Marceus Lioneye were naught but lament for his pride.

title.name: The Long Con
title.flavour text: "This was the proudest moment of my life." "... so far"

title.name: The Long Watch
title.flavour text: The rain pelts down, Mud grasping at his feet, as thoughts of those in his care bolster his resolve.

title.name: The Lord in Black
title.flavour text: Thy knee shall bend in shifting dark, thy blade shall serve his vigil. Thy oath shall bind thee to his mark, thy flesh shall bear his sigil.

title.name: The Lord of Celebration
title.flavour text: Though they were a pack of elite combatants, the Emperor's royal guards were not ready to face one of his notorious parties.

title.name: The Lover
title.flavour text: "I wanted to give you three things. I've given you my eternal love. I've sung to you my most beautiful song. I'd have given you the moon last, but it couldn't be found. I hope you'll accept this instead."

title.name: The Lunaris Priestess
title.flavour text: Embrace the Light, Await the Morrow, No more Spite, And no more Sorrow.

title.name: The Mad King
title.flavour text: Fear the man who lusts for power, for he will do anything to get it.

title.name: The Magma Crab
title.flavour text: Drink deeply of living rock and be as stone, with blood afire.

title.name: The Master
title.flavour text: In a world filled with chaos, he could always seek comfort in the hands of his master.

title.name: The Master Artisan
title.flavour text: Perfection is the standard, excellence will be handled on a case by case basis.

title.name: The Mayor
title.flavour text: A ruler is only as powerful as he is wealthy. Control the coin, control the empire.

title.name: The Mercenary
title.flavour text: Loyalty can be bought. Just make sure you know who the buyer is.

title.name: The Messenger
title.flavour text: <span class="glyph hbgi04"></span><span class="glyph HBG04"></span><span class="glyph HBGAt"></span><span class="glyph HBG03"></span><span class="glyph HBGAs"></span><span class="glyph HBG01"></span><span class="glyph HBGAy"></span><span class="glyph HBG01"></span><span class="glyph HBGBa"></span> <span class="glyph hbgi04"></span><span class="glyph HBG02"></span><span class="glyph HBGAk"></span><span class="glyph HBG03"></span><span class="glyph HBGBd"></span> <span class="glyph hbgi04"></span><span class="glyph HBG02"></span><span class="glyph HBGAm"></span><span class="glyph HBG01"></span><span class="glyph HBGAa"></span> <span class="glyph HBGBc"></span><span class="glyph HBG03"></span><span class="glyph HBGAy"></span><span class="glyph hbgi00"></span><span class="glyph HBGBe"></span><span class="glyph HBG03"></span><span class="glyph HBGAd"></span>

title.name: The Metalsmith's Gift
title.flavour text: A month's work, a year's wages, a foolish shortcut through a Rhoa's nest, and a grieving bride-to-be, who never received her betrothed's great gift.

title.name: The Mind's Eyes
title.flavour text: Through the eyes of a person, you can see their soul Through the eyes of a jewel, you can see the universe

title.name: The Mountain
title.flavour text: Charmed by beautiful stones Consumed with the pursuit of perfection Ever deeper into the waiting dark

title.name: The Nurse
title.flavour text: We tried to tell him to get his head checked.

title.name: The Oath
title.flavour text: An oath once made is an oath never broken. Do not delay in keeping it, for I take no pleasure in fools.

title.name: The Obscured
title.flavour text: Our world, dangerous as it is, is far safer than what lies just beyond our sight.

title.name: The Offering
title.flavour text: Eternal beauty has a cost, one which Shavronne was happy to pay with the lives of others.

title.name: The Offspring
title.flavour text: The swarm began with just a couple of children. Now, it is her entire existence.

title.name: The Old Man
title.flavour text: Hear me, fish! I love and respect you, but before this day ends I will kill you dead.

title.name: The One That Got Away
title.flavour text: Savor life's missing pieces. To complete one's final goal is to take one's last breath.

title.name: The One With All
title.flavour text: Embrace death to honour the lost, no fear in life no matter the cost. With one of all we are, and all of one we trust, throughout past, present and future... be just.

title.name: The Opulent
title.flavour text: Wealth can, in fact, buy happiness.

title.name: The Pack Leader
title.flavour text: Become the leader you were born to be.

title.name: The Pact
title.flavour text: "On this day I mark the first of many agreements that I will have with this land and its people."

title.name: The Patient
title.flavour text: I have a headache, can anyone find me a nurse?

title.name: The Penitent
title.flavour text: First, I gave my wealth, and we went hungry. Next, I gave my land, and we were homeless. Then, I gave my family, and I was alone. Last, I gave my eyes, and all I could dream was mine.

title.name: The Poet
title.flavour text: God had forsaken the land And Victario wept. Corruption consumed the land And Victario's tears turned to blood.

title.name: The Polymath
title.flavour text: Genius knows no limits.

title.name: The Porcupine
title.flavour text: The first quill separates the quick learners from the dead.

title.name: The Price of Devotion
title.flavour text: Unbeknown to Atziri's finest thaumaturgists, their loyalty would require far greater devotion than mere research.

title.name: The Price of Loyalty
title.flavour text: "Forge me a carapace from their skin, imbued with their soul. Then feed their flesh to the hounds."

title.name: The Price of Prescience
title.flavour text: The strange voice showed Aul a future where his legacy was forgotten, where new cultures broke themselves upon Aul's ruined world.

title.name: The Price of Protection
title.flavour text: To protect her mansion, she would cut a deal with anyone. Anything.  Something answered.

title.name: The Primordial
title.flavour text: We play at God with our necromancy, but forces far more potent sleep within these stones.

title.name: The Prince of Darkness
title.flavour text: Fear a man who is willing to sacrifice anything for power.

title.name: The Professor
title.flavour text: The academic route to knowledge is wide and well-trodden; but it is the untaught one who scales the mountain.

title.name: The Progeny of Lunaris
title.flavour text: Born beneath silver light, bearing Lunaris' mark. Conjuring all his might, the Prodigy turned light to dark.

title.name: The Puzzle
title.flavour text: As countless fractures weaken the divide, nightmares seep through from the other side.

title.name: The Queen
title.flavour text: The power of the world, lies upon your hands.

title.name: The Rabbit's Foot
title.flavour text: It is said anyone who bears this trinket is the luckiest exile in all of Wraeclast. The gods would disagree, and forever curse any whom give it away.

title.name: The Rabid Rhoa
title.flavour text: "Experiment 22A: Rhoas, when deprived of water, secrete a most delightfully potent toxin." - Maligaro

title.name: The Realm
title.flavour text: If you wish to rush into strange places, be prepared to face strange things.

title.name: The Return of the Rat
title.flavour text: And he shall be heralded by the screams of the damned.

title.name: The Risk
title.flavour text: "There is no right or wrong choice, no best or worst. There are only choices and their consequences."

title.name: The Rite of Elements
title.flavour text: A mind as quick as lightning, fists as hard as stone, a heart that burns with fury, and eyes that chill to the bone.

title.name: The Road to Power
title.flavour text: A beacon on the horizon; a guiding light, a call for help, or a warning to turn back.

title.name: The Rusted Bard
title.flavour text: Fourfold the refrain, fortissimo cheer. One hundred rent twain, naught left for a bier. The song rattles on, though hollow a bit. See the hope is gone, no prize shall ye get.

title.name: The Ruthless Ceinture
title.flavour text: In combat, a warrior must first be resourceful, and second, decisive.

title.name: The Sacrifice
title.flavour text: For some, the price of power is never too great.

title.name: The Saint's Treasure
title.flavour text: Publicly, he lived a pious and chaste life of poverty. Privately, tithes and tributes made him and his lascivious company very comfortable indeed.

title.name: The Samurai's Eye
title.flavour text: At night, when the seas are calm, and the skies dark, he can see it. The formless fiend that took his eye, and fractured his mind.

title.name: The Scarred Meadow
title.flavour text: The earth offers nourishment, growth and healing. Unless, of course, the sky has other plans.

title.name: The Scavenger
title.flavour text: Take small pieces of things and then assemble them together

title.name: The Scholar
title.flavour text: It is with the smallest of words that we find the largest of truths.

title.name: The Scout
title.flavour text: The first to travel are often rewarded for their journey, but all the treasure in the world cannot bring back those that are lost.

title.name: The Seeker
title.flavour text: All that is flawed is worthless. The slightest error, and this might as well be trash.

title.name: The Sephirot
title.flavour text: If the path to divinity were simple, we'd all be gods.

title.name: The Shepherd's Sandals
title.flavour text: He who watches the flock is himself watched by those with loyalty beyond measure.

title.name: The Shieldbearer
title.flavour text: While you grow, I shall be your knight, and you my squire. One day, you shall be the one who stands and defends our home.

title.name: The Shortcut
title.flavour text: If time is the most valuable currency, how do you make more of it?

title.name: The Side Quest
title.flavour text: You'll never know the things you miss if you keep your eyes closed

title.name: The Sigil
title.flavour text: Three men travel through the gate; they carry a protective ward. A faction conspires against their fate, but magic unravels the sword.

title.name: The Siren
title.flavour text: At the beck and call of The Siren's hand, winter ravages the trembling land, and the weight of ice that binds will break the strongest of minds.

title.name: The Skeleton
title.flavour text: They stand among us, and within us.

title.name: The Soul
title.flavour text: "Most people only have one. I'm a bit of a hoarder."

title.name: The Spark and the Flame
title.flavour text: When sky meets ground the flames can be found, but who has the will to tame them.

title.name: The Spoiled Prince
title.flavour text: A boy who grows up with everything learns to appreciate nothing.

title.name: The Standoff
title.flavour text: Sometimes your greatest enemy is the only one keeping you breathing.

title.name: The Stormcaller
title.flavour text: If you beckon the Lord of Lightning, do not be surprised when you are struck.

title.name: The Strategist
title.flavour text: Know thine enemy better than you know thyself.

title.name: The Summoner
title.flavour text: To own a piece of the Nightmare, you must first belong to the Nightmare.

title.name: The Sun
title.flavour text: Each night, the light dies, and each morning she is born anew, embracing the land in her golden wings.

title.name: The Surgeon
title.flavour text: "He might be lacking in vision, but his virtuosity is undeniable." - Malachai, on Maligaro

title.name: The Surveyor
title.flavour text: Exploring lands made of flesh and sorrow, we'll reap and plunder like there's no tomorrow.

title.name: The Survivalist
title.flavour text: A lucky number For us all To help us through The perils told.

title.name: The Sustenance
title.flavour text: She took all she had and turned it into something she was craving.

title.name: The Sword King's Salute
title.flavour text: Many were slain by the sword king Their blood decorating his ring Those who retreated were slaughtered Those who fought bravely were honoured

title.name: The Thaumaturgist
title.flavour text: "Mastery of thaumaturgy is like any other pursuit; it requires dedication and sacrifice. Sometimes several sacrifices." - Shavronne of Umbra

title.name: The Throne
title.flavour text: A king's movement is unwavering.

title.name: The Tinkerer's Table
title.flavour text: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

title.name: The Tireless Extractor
title.flavour text: "I am not alone in this. I have God by my side! And... you help sometimes, I suppose." - Sister Cassia

title.name: The Tower
title.flavour text: A tower built of the strongest stone is not eternal; a towering intellect is not enlightened.

title.name: The Traitor
title.flavour text: Sometimes an apprentice becomes a master through countless hours of hard work and practice. Sometimes it happens by force.

title.name: The Transformation
title.flavour text: Even the most beautiful of transformations can still have a dark side.

title.name: The Trial
title.flavour text: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

title.name: The Tumbleweed
title.flavour text: Love is the only redemption after succumbing to the grasps of the Wasteland.

title.name: The Twilight Moon
title.flavour text: The day is dying, the night is born, the air grows cool, the sky is torn.

title.name: The Twins
title.flavour text: Two sides of a coin; Heads for a friend, tails a foe; Gemini toss up

title.name: The Tyrant
title.flavour text: "Fear controls the masses." - Laszlo, the Scourge

title.name: The Undaunted
title.flavour text: "Fate was always my nemesis... But it didn't stop me then, and it won't stop me now." - Kjetilbrann, The Undaunted

title.name: The Undisputed
title.flavour text: To create something truly spectacular, you must risk total failure.

title.name: The Unexpected Prize
title.flavour text: They came from far and wide under a common banner. They sought companionship and competition, but found a treasure none had foreseen.

title.name: The Union
title.flavour text: On the 21st of Eterni, two become one, their light outshines the setting sun.

title.name: The Valkyrie
title.flavour text: The villain strikes, the world is torn. A war begins, a hero is born, The nemesis sets the sky alight. A hero's sacrifice sets everything right. - Drake's Epitaph

title.name: The Valley of Steel Boxes
title.flavour text: "The most valuable treasures should be hidden in plain sight." - Ina, Keeper of Goods

title.name: The Vast
title.flavour text: Can you hear the siren's calls, Just beyond the sea? A voice which hearts of men enthralls, I too am hooked to thee.

title.name: The Visionary
title.flavour text: Lioneye looked to the heights of glorious victory. And thus he missed the defeat right under his nose.

title.name: The Void
title.flavour text: Reach into the Void and claim your prize.

title.name: The Warden
title.flavour text: Brutus' first innovation as Lord Incarcerator was a weighted chain around every neck so that his prisoners would forever bow to him.

title.name: The Warlord
title.flavour text: To cure the Goddess, and break the chains of corruption, you must shatter the world.

title.name: The Watcher
title.flavour text: Strange eyes on top of spines Gaze beyond the veil of time Deep down below the mines A dream of crimson and of grime

title.name: The Web
title.flavour text: A weapon, a shelter, a prison. The web's purpose changes with the spider's needs. A lesson we should take to heart.

title.name: The Wedding Gift
title.flavour text: The acolytes congratulated the lucky groom for becoming one with the goddess.

title.name: The White Knight
title.flavour text: Where Decay festers, I shall expunge it, and leave in its place a shining monument.

title.name: The Whiteout
title.flavour text: They thought winter had come early, that snow blanketed the land, but in truth, all their chickens had come home to roost.

title.name: The Wilted Rose
title.flavour text: Though the path to divinity is fraught with peril, hope may bloom from within.

title.name: The Wind
title.flavour text: Weaving through the cracks, searching for weaknesses, silent, indiscriminate, leaving sorrow in its wake.

title.name: The Witch
title.flavour text: A wanderer in the wild strives Against countless foes he survives A fool pursues a quest contrived By the gift of the witch, alive.

title.name: The Wolf
title.flavour text: The largest beasts cannot be overpowered. The Greatwolf teaches us to use guile, not strength, to probe for the soft flesh and strike deep.

title.name: The Wolf's Legacy
title.flavour text: The howls and cackling could not mask the sadness.

title.name: The Wolf's Shadow
title.flavour text: "If I fall, we will fall together with my fangs in your throat."

title.name: The Wolven King's Bite
title.flavour text: A wolf does not bite his mate as he does his prey, yet both begin with bared teeth. Know who you are, and you will know the meaning of the bite.

title.name: The Wolverine
title.flavour text: Claw them from the bottom, you'll be glad that you have got 'em, claw them from the top, you'll never want to stop.

title.name: The World Eater
title.flavour text: Its body knows no limits. Its appetite knows no bounds.

title.name: The Wrath
title.flavour text: "Daughter of catastrophe, mother of pain. Amongst the filth of Wraeclast, she wanders, and her wrath follows." - Quintoon the Returned

title.name: The Wretched
title.flavour text: Necromancers, believe me, are more terrifying than their thralls.

title.name: Thirst for Knowledge
title.flavour text: A ravenous mind can readily take in ideas from any source. Fortunately for the scholars, he has already learned about sustainability.

title.name: Three Faces in the Dark
title.flavour text: For every threat you spy in the shadows, there are two others you don't.

title.name: Three Voices
title.flavour text: The village elders had a curious rule: If you hear three voices scream for aid, flee as fast as you can.

title.name: Thunderous Skies
title.flavour text: Many that have wielded the power of lightning have said that death by electrocution looks like the victim is more alive than ever before.

title.name: Time-Lost Relic
title.flavour text: Time cannot wash away that which cannot be forgotten.

title.name: Tranquillity
title.flavour text: Beware the sudden calm, for it is a sure sign of a storm on the horizon.

title.name: Treasure Hunter
title.flavour text: "Don't worry, I know what I'm doing." - Toggo's Last Words

title.name: Treasures of the Vaal
title.flavour text: The cities of the Empire were plundered by those who came after... all but one.

title.name: Triskaidekaphobia
title.flavour text: The Mists of Madness prey on those who harbour the deepest of fears.

title.name: Turn the Other Cheek
title.flavour text: "Only after one forsakes rage, can true power be found." - Sekhema Asenath

title.name: Unchained
title.flavour text: Mold the world with your bare hands. Be careful, for what is your doing might become your undoing.

title.name: Underground Forest
title.flavour text: "In the forest again... But at least I have these."

title.name: Unrequited Love
title.flavour text: The pale flame of his heart disappeared in his azure reflection. The work of a life. Ambitious, and unfinished.

title.name: Vile Power
title.flavour text: Dread and danger makes the air feel thin. Above, power slumbers, tempting fate. Greed and ambition draws countless in, For those who seek power can never wait.

title.name: Vinia's Token
title.flavour text: You can change your name, but you cannot change your history.

title.name: Void of the Elements
title.flavour text: Though the forces of nature are mighty and intimidating, it is their absence which should be feared.

title.name: Volatile Power
title.flavour text: Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it.

title.name: Wealth and Power
title.flavour text: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth or power he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to positively affect those around him.

title.name: Winter's Embrace
title.flavour text: Come home to me, my sweet. Oh, how long you've been! Lie with me in the frozen dark. I may yet find forgiveness Now that fear has left you.
